extendedInfo.description: Desert,temple, monster, rampage - get the gun, and fight for the glory!Beware of the bloody - it's the way to win the glory!# Unlock battle arenas - desert, gobi, forest and temple.# Unlock all kinds of guns - AK47, M4A1, H&K MP5, and etc.# Learn dodge skill to protect yourself.# Call for air support in an emergency.# Shoot monster's head to double damge.Can you win the battle finally?==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory, Shoot the Apple and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: Brilliance on screen
reviews.comment: Love it good hand eye co- ordination training love the bugs and best of all ITS FREE ????
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tim
reviews.comment: I love the game I have all the coin up grades. Now I have almost a half million coins and can\'t use them need a way to convert coins to crystals. Like 10000 coins for a crystal or something. I don\'t want to uninstall but I will if I can\'t progress anymore.would appreciate it thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game!
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars but upset that upgrades seem to do close to nothing! At level 30, upgraded damage and firing speed several times but still takes 3 to 4 hits to kill monsters! Fix and i will give 5 stars.

reviews.comment: one of the top games. well written , with minimal problems.  lots of fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and simple
reviews.comment: Upgrading anything takes too long...without spending money that is...also there are only three different stages, so it can become boring. After you reach level 300 the game becomes incredibly difficult. But overall it\'s simply fun to shoot bad guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FIRE FIRE FIRE!!!
reviews.comment: Simple & addictive shoot em up. Runs perfect. Good graphics. I\'ve reached level 462 without spending any money on upgrades. Upgrading is slow but I\'ve now maxed gun damage (level 99), firing rate (level 60) and HP (300 pts). Awesome power! Hint: Upgrade firing rate & HP first. Upgrading supergun chance: once it hit level 20, I\'d get it about once per stage. Pretty useless before that. Game becomes a LOT harder from level 300. Save your 3 bombs for then.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Trash.
reviews.comment: I\'ve never played another game that recreates the level of \'fun\' you\'d get from being involved on a horrific train crash, in the same way this game does.  Do yourselves a favour guys, don\'t bother.
reviews.author: A Google User
